title: The History of Tea
content: Tea is one of the most popular beverages in the world. It originated in China thousands of years ago...

questions.question: Where did tea originate?
questions.explanation: Tea originated in China over 5000 years ago, according to historical records.

questions.question: Tea became popular in Europe before Asia.
questions.explanation: Tea was consumed in Asia long before it became known in Europe.

questions.question: Tea is one of the most popular ______ in the world.
questions.explanation: This sentence comes directly from the first line of the passage.
